title: Enhanced ResNet for CIFAR-10 Classification
description: Optimized a ResNet-based model by integrating SE Attention and MixCut augmentation. Achieved 96.19% accuracy on CIFAR-10 with only 4.79M parameters using cosine annealing scheduler.

title: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning of RoBERTa
description: Fine-tuned a RoBERTa model using LoRA for a Kaggle text classification competition. Covered model setup, data preprocessing, training, and evaluation. Achieved competitive performance with reduced parameter tuning.

title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
description: Python Notebook to analyse the social media trends as part of a Data Science Bootcamp I took at NYU

title: Enhanced ResNet for CIFAR-10 Classification
description: Developed an optimized ResNet-based architecture integrating SE attention and MixCut augmentations. Achieved 96.19% accuracy with 4.79M parameters.

title: Urban Sustainability Calculator
description: Built a real-time AI-powered sustainability tool analyzing environmental, economic, and social factors using OpenStreetMap and Google Gemini.

title: Semantic Image Segmentation of Breast Cancer using UNET
description: Designed a U-Net model trained on 1578 breast ultrasound images. Achieved 97.91% accuracy and IOU of 0.8341 using TensorFlow.

title: WhatsApp Chat Analyzer
description: Analyzed 500K+ messages to extract 30+ metrics including emojis, peak activity hours, and sentiment trends. Visualized via Matplotlib.

title: Campus Ticket Hub
description: Built a full-stack system for event ticketing with user auth, PDF generation, and booking analytics.

title: Manipal Convocation Portal
description: Live deployment used for convocation registrations. Built with React, Firebase, and MongoDB, integrated Hostinger's email API.
